[QUESTION]
Why did the total cloud and license expense increase in fiscal 2019 compared to fiscal 2018?

[ANSWER]
['In constant currency, total cloud and license expenses increased in fiscal 2019 compared to fiscal 2018 due to higher sales and marketing expenses and higher cloud services and license support expenses, each of which increased primarily due to higher employee related expenses from higher headcount and due to higher technology infrastructure expenses.'] | Answer derived directly from the table values.
